attributes.action: sell peerages to the highest bidders to fund political parties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A practice way of funding political parties is required, I suggest that business men etc.. are asked to donate money to political parties and in return they receive life peerages and the right to legislate over the rest of us. This is a serious suggestion and not funny at all.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
